items.question: How quickly can I get started with blipee OS?
items.answer: Most customers are up and running within 24 hours. Our no-code integrations can be set up in minutes, while custom API integrations typically take 1-2 weeks depending on complexity.

items.question: Do you offer training and onboarding?
items.answer: Yes! All plans include free onboarding, training sessions, and access to our comprehensive documentation. Enterprise customers get dedicated success managers and custom training programs.

items.question: What kind of support do you provide?
items.answer: We offer multiple support channels: live chat, email, phone, and video calls. Professional and Enterprise plans include priority support with faster response times and dedicated account managers.

items.question: Can I integrate blipee OS with my existing systems?
items.answer: Absolutely! We support integrations with major POS systems, cameras, CRM platforms, and more. Our API allows custom integrations, and we offer pre-built connectors for popular platforms.

items.question: Is my data secure with blipee OS?
items.answer: Yes, security is our top priority. We're SOC 2 certified, GDPR compliant, and use enterprise-grade encryption. All data is processed anonymously and we never store personally identifiable customer information.
